TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigExcC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的数字签名的专用 C14N XML 规范化转换（不带注释）。

span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示不带注释的专用 C14N XML 规范化转换。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform without comments. 此类是类似于类，该类允许签名者创建使用 XML 文档的规范格式的摘要。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 但是，类从规范化的子文档中排除上级上下文。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 使用类时需要规范化 XML 子文档，以便它不依赖于从其 XML 上下文。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如，应用程序等使用的 Web 服务签名的 XML 中复杂的通信协议通常需要以这种方式规范化 XML。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 此类应用程序通常封装各种动态构造的元素，其可显著更改文档，并导致 XML 签名验证失败中的 XML。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 类从规范的子文档中排除此类上级上下文，从而解决了此问题。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 通常情况下，不创建规范化转换类的新实例。Typically, you do not create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换，请将传递描述转换到的统一资源标识符 (URI)属性，它是从可访问属性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes a transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取对规范化变换的引用，使用属性，它是从可访问属性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 将要求你将创建规范化转换类的新实例，仅当你想要手动哈希处理 XML 文档或使用您自己的规范化算法。You are required to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class only when you want to manually hash an XML document or use your own canonicalization algorithm. URI，它描述类定义由字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. URI，它描述类定义由字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关专用 C14N 转换的详细信息，请参阅在 XMLDSIG 规范，可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. W3C 规范 XML 规范，它位于 www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n 中定义的规范化算法。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 XML 文档签名类通过封装签名。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/VB/example.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList) cil managed

param.name: inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList
param.span: 要使用标准规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀。

span.span: The namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

summary.span: 初始化 类的一个新实例，并指定要使用标准规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀列表。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`参数包含一个空格分隔的使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀列表。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定默认的命名空间，没有前缀，传递的特殊前缀"#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个空格分隔的使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀列表。The property contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定默认的命名空间，没有前缀，传递的特殊前缀"#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 XML 文档签名类通过封装签名。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. summary.span: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的有效输入。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输入类型数组；只能将属于这些类型之一的对象传递给当前 对象的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组属性必须包含至少一个元素，因为每个对象必须接受作为有效输入至少一个类型。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every object must accept at least one type as valid input. 一个对象通常接受一个或多个以下类型作为输入： ， ，或。A object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: , , or .

summary.span: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的可能输出。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the methods of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输出类型数组；当前 对象的 方法只返回属于这些类型之一的对象。

span.span: An array of valid output types for the current object; the methods of the current object return only objects of one of these types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组属性必须包含至少一个元素，因为每个转换必须生成至少一种类型作为输出。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
